EURO-SPACE VPS Hosting Features:

+ Industry Top datacenter in Maidenhead, UK
+ 15 day money back guarantee, no questions asked!
+ 24x7 Technical Support
+ FREE dedicated IP address
+ Intel Xeon Multi-Core processors on VPS nodes
+ Registered ECC RAM packed VPS nodes, with generous reserves
+ Fully redundant RAID drive arrays for faster I/O
+ Quality Supermicro servers in our own Colo Cages
+ Never Oversold, your allowances are dedicated to only you
+ Root/Admin Access
+ Unlimited inbound bandwidth
+ FREE Enom Domain Reseller account
+ WHM/Cpanel VPS optimized for just EUR 12.99/ month
+ Choice of OS: CentOS, Debian, Fedora, SUSE, Ubuntu, AltLinux, Arch Linux, Gentoo, Scientific Linux, Slackware



ABOUT US:

EURO-SPACE has been trusted and reliable provider in web hosting since 2007.

We run our business from Sweden and prepared top of the line Supermicro servers in Maidenhead, UK Datacenter, with up to 100MBit/s. connection through Cisco Hardware Firewalls.

EURO-SPACE offers unmanaged or self-managed VPS hosting bundled with industry leading software, lots of ECC-RAM and RAID Drives. Every VPS node is powered by OpenVZ virtualization software.

Choose from a wide selection of operating systems, add-ons and control panels like cPanel/WHM for more features and control. Our team of skilled and experienced server administrators are 100% dedicated to providing you with the best VPS hosting experience including exceptional 24x7 technical support.

Our VPS servers are completely dedicated to your account. A Virtual Private server can be used for a wide variety of purposes, including gaming, virtual (i.e., shared) hosting, hosting of traffic-intensive Web sites and running your own web hosting business.


FAQ:

Do you allow adult content?
YES, we allow legal adult content


Do you allow Torrents, IRC's, VPN's, and Proxies?
Yes, for now, but this may change if we begin to see abuse.


What locations are available?
Our datacenter is located in the UK, Maidenhead datacenter. We are happy to accommodate any location but do not advertise them as available, they may not be without delays for new equipment. Depending on demand we tend to stock various areas faster than others.


I am currently with a reseller provider and want to offer reseller accounts. Can I create reseller accounts with a VPS?
Yes you can. You will get root access and adding software such as cPanel/WHM makes those tasks much simplier. With cPanel you can create reseller accounts just as you would on a dedicated server. Moreover, we can offer migration of your cPanel reseller accounts FREE of charge!


Do you offer an uptime guarantee?
Yes we offer a 100% uptime SLA guarantee on the Network and VPS hardware node the contains your VPS. As long as you can reach the network and the server, we have done our part. What goes inside your VPS is up to you.


See more info at www.euro-space.net
